topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a0c08063687266a9003027#post_55a0c08063687266a9003027
That's actually a fair guess.  If they do perfect making programs that sing better than humans there will still be a industry for human singers, just not as much. . . but considering the shit pile that the music industry has putting out lately it's not that bad of a future.


The first "singers" that will probably be replaced will be people like Snooki or Nicki.  The second we have computers singing better than humans these people are out the door.

More than likely the music industry for humans will probably become quality > quantity.
